name: Perspective (itch) (Jacob Speicher)
description:
This is mostly just a proof of concept and a thing I used to learn some about how Unreal Engine 4 works. I love the game FEZ and some of the perspective block puzzles it has where you need to make tetris shapes in different perspectives. There isn't an end state or a goal with Perspective, I just wanted to see if I could kinda recreate that perspective-switching shape-making magic.

Controls
=============
Left click : Select a block (Left click again anywhere to unselect)
Arrow keys : Move the selected block around (left is always left, right is always right, etc from each perspective)
Tab : Change camera view from orthagonal to projection and back
Escape : Quit

The above is also included in Instructions.txt in the Perspective folder after unzipping, so you don't have to come back here to see how to actually "play."
